description: Resource Type definition for AWS::NetworkManager::CoreNetworkPrefixListAssociation which associates a prefix list with a core network.

CoreNetworkId.description: The ID of the core network.
CoreNetworkId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the core network.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

PrefixListArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the prefix list.
PrefixListArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the prefix list.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9-]+:ec2:[a-z]+-[a-z]+-[0-9]:([0-9]{12}):prefix-list/pl-[a-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

PrefixListAlias.description: The alias of the prefix list
PrefixListAlias.markdownDescription:
The alias of the prefix list

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement
